Headline: Temporary #7 Harrison Reroute near Damen/Polk.
ShortDescription: 7 Harrison buses temp. rerouted near Damen/Polk.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Damen/Polk.

Eastbound buses will operate via Harrison, Western, Jackson, Loomis, Harrison, and resume normal route.

Western buses will operate via Harrison, Loomis, Van Buren, Western, Harrison, and resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green Line trains bypassing Oak Park Station
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are running, but not stopping at Oak Park station due to a police investigation.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are running, but not stopping at Oak Park station due to a police investigation.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include:

  • #20 Madison buses

Also, as a result of the delay, shuttle buses are requested from Harlem/Lake to Ashland/Lake to provide connecting service in both directions.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
